title: Boa Viagem Esporte Clube
text:
Boa Viagem Esporte Clube, commonly known as Boa Viagem, is a Brazilian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Boa%20Viagem%2C%20Cear%C3%A1">Boa Viagem</a>, <a href="Cear%C3%A1">Ceará state</a>.
History.
The club was founded on December 22, 1999. They finished in the second position in the <a href="Campeonato%20Cearense%20%28lower%20levels%29">Campeonato Cearense Second Level</a> in 2000, when they lost the competition to <a href="Itapaj%C3%A9%20Futebol%20Clube">Itapajé</a>, and in 2007, when they lost the competition to <a href="Horizonte%20Futebol%20Clube">Horizonte</a>.
Stadium.
Boa Viagem Esporte Clube play their home games at <a href="Est%C3%A1dio%20Municipal%20Segismundo%20Rodrigues%20Neto">Estádio Municipal Segismundo Rodrigues Neto</a>, nicknamed "Serjão". The stadium has a maximum capacity of 5,000 people.
